instructions.title: How to get an OpenAI API key for GPT-4o
instructions.intro: To use the advanced AI assistant features based on GPT-4o, you need an OpenAI API key. Below are instructions on how to get it:

step1.title: Step 1: Create an OpenAI account
step1.desc: Visit https://platform.openai.com/signup and create an account if you don't have one yet.

step2.title: Step 2: Sign in to your account
step2.desc: Go to https://platform.openai.com/login and sign in to your OpenAI account.

step3.title: Step 3: Go to the API panel
step3.desc: After signing in, go to the API section in the navigation panel.

step4.title: Step 4: Add a payment method
step4.desc: To use the OpenAI API, you must add a payment method. OpenAI offers free credit for new users, but after it is used you will have to pay for API usage.

step5.title: Step 5: Generate an API key
step5.desc: Go to the 'API keys' section and click 'Create new secret key'. Give the key a descriptive name, e.g. 'MRP System'.

step6.title: Step 6: Copy and save the API key
step6.desc: Copy the generated API key (starts with 'sk-'). NOTE: This key will be shown only once, so make sure you save it!

step7.title: Step 7: Enter the key in the assistant settings
step7.desc: Paste the copied API key in the 'OpenAI API Key' field in the AI assistant settings.

important.title: Important information:
important.confidential: Your API key is confidential â€“ do not share it with anyone.
important.billing: OpenAI charges for API usage based on the number of tokens processed by the model.
important.gpt4oCost: GPT-4o is OpenAI's most advanced model and may incur higher costs than others.
important.monitor: You can monitor your usage and costs in the OpenAI dashboard under 'Usage'.
important.deactivate: You can deactivate or delete your API key in the OpenAI dashboard at any time.
